sources.title: The Two-Alarm Fire (1934)
sources.description: Popeye and Bluto run adjoining (and competing) fire companies. When Olive's huge house catches fire, they are soon more interested in fighting each other than the fire. When Bluto goes to the roof to rescue Olive, the fire strands him there. Popeye eats his spinach and rescues them, but it's too late for the house. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-two-alarm-fire-1934/

metadata.Plot: Popeye and Bluto run adjoining (and competing) fire companies. When Olive's huge house catches fire, they are soon more interested in fighting each other than the fire. When Bluto goes to the roof to rescue Olive, the fire strands him there. Popeye eats his spinach and rescues them, but it's too late for the house.
metadata.Actors: William Costello, William Pennell, Mae Questel
